options.title: Red fancy tiger
options.description: A beautiful and unique hybrid shrimp known for its intricate red-and-white striped patterns. As part of the Taiwan Bee shrimp family, these shrimp require soft, slightly acidic water, stable conditions, and careful maintenance to thrive. While they are sensitive to water parameters, their striking appearance and ease of breeding make them a rewarding species for experienced shrimp keepers and breeders.
